author: jacopoc
msg: The remove layout features is still not supported in this screen, so I'm commenting out the link to call it (OFBIZ-263).

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied (slightly modified) patch from Rashko Rejmer (OFBIZ-505) to fix a bug in the "lookup party and user login" screen.
However, this lookup has still at least one issue: userLogins that don't have a party associated to them are not shown (for example, the "system" userLogin).

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Al Byers "createPartyPostalAddress should set contactMechTypeId" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-517).

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Stefan Huehner "Code-Cleanup: new Boolean(true) -> Boolean.TRUE" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-530).
